power.title: Cat's Trickery
power.fluff: You plunge the room into darkness at the same time as your eyes pierce the darkness

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one light source no larger than a lantern

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain darkvision and the target light source is doused.
If the light source was a natural flame, it must be lit again.

power.title: Cloak of Shades
power.fluff: A shadowy haze swirls around you, hiding you from view

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain concealment against all creatures and are invisible to all creatures that are more than 5 squares away from you.

power.title: Contrivance of Speed
power.fluff: Your deft speed and skill allow you to move around combat effortlessly

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Contrivance of Speed stance.
Until the stance ends, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You shift 2 squares.

power.title: Converging Shadows
power.fluff: Darkness gathers to shield you from harm

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy targets you with a melee attack or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
If the triggering attack misses you, you can make a Stealth check to hide.

power.title: Distracting Illusion
power.fluff: The image of a creature flickers and then solidifies as you craft an illusion meant to cover your dark deeds

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create the illusion of a Medium or smaller creature of your choice in an unoccupied square in the burst until the end of your next turn.

The illusion is silent but moves and acts as though it was the creature it appears to be. Creatures that closely examine the illusion can make an Insight check against a DC equal to 10 + your Bluff check modifier to discover the illusion for what it is.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The illusion persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it up to 6 squares.

power.title: Lurking Shadow
power.fluff: You meld with the shadows, allowing you to spy on your enemies without fear of discovery

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be in dim light or darkness.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You become unvisible and silent until the end of your next turn. This effect immediately ends if you move more than 2 squares on your turn, or you enter a square of bright light.
If a creature tries to enter your space before the effect ends, you can either shift 1 square as a free reaction or remain where you are. If you remain where you are, the effect ends.

section.name: Sustain Standard:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

If you use this power outside of combat, you can sustain it for up to 1 hour. After 1 hour, you can expend a healing surge to be able to sustain this effect for an additional two hours. You can keep expending healing surges, increasing the time you can sustain this power by 2 hours each time.

power.title: Shadowed Legion
power.fluff: Your shadow lengthens to veil your allies from foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Shadowed Legion stance.
Until the stance ends, allies within 5 squares of you can use your Stealth check modifier instead of their own Stealth check modifier when making Stealth checks.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can remain in this stance for 1 hour.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: For 2 hours.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: For 4 hours.

power.title: Silent Stalker
power.fluff: You pad quietly toward your victim, unseen and unheard

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be hidden.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to you speed to a space within 2 squares of an enemy.
You remain hidden until the end of your current turn or until you make an attack, even if you have no cover or concealment.

power.title: Smoke Cloud
power.fluff: With a bit of shadow magic mixed with the right materials, you conjure a wall of smoke to cover your escape

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of smoke until the start of the acting creature's next turn.
Squares in the zone are lighty obscured.
You can shift up to your speed.

power.title: Summon the Mists
power.fluff: A thick fog rises around you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of mist until the end of the encounter.
Squares in the zone are lightly obscured.
